DRUM JAM ON THE SIDEWALK! again!

Tuesday, October 23, 2012
12:30 PM To 3:30 PM

DrumConnection Center for World Music
177 Massachusetts Ave, Arlington, MA (map)

On Mass Ave, Arlington, the main street. Between Arlington Center and FreshPond. Across from Capital Movie theatre.

Hi everyone! Last Tuesday was a delight! In the warm sun, people dropping by to jam, passersby stopping to discover drumming is easy and fun. Just RELAXING and a great break from politics and stress.

LET'S DO IT AGAIN!!

This Tuesday, I'll be helping at the DrumConnection Center for World Percussion, 177 Mass Ave, Arlington. The store and class facility. Always love visitors. Take a break from whatever-you-do and just come hang out on the sidewalk and jam. Sort of a neighborhood impromptu drum circle.

In case of bad weather we can use the classroom downstairs until the kids class people arrive around 3:30pm.

Come help raise the energy. FREE PIZZA, or simply water for the pizza phobic:) :) (like us)

We have some extra drums. For that matter, I will be glad to show you some of the finest drums in this country. The djembe and dunun equivalent of a Steinway, some at the drumming equivalent to a Stradavarius.

I'll be there at noon.

Please RSVP so we know who is coming, and we have a limit of 15 people.

Love to see you there.

questions, or lost? I'm at 617-967-2962

PS... and REMEMBER .. the FRAMINGHAM DRUM CIRCLE is this Sat!!

See you there!! WE NEED THIS AS AN ANTIDOTE TO ALL THAT POLITICAL NEGATIVITY!!

Come celebrate LIFE!

This is a FREE event. Donations for the upcoming trip to Africa accepted to help extremely poor and sick people in Guinea.
